rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall that aligns with Vastu by positioning the main entry in the north direction.
Open and airy living space with large windows on the east side to invite positivity according to Vastu principles.
Dining area integrated with the kitchen for easy access, placed in the south-east zone as per Vastu norms.
A functional kitchen attached to the dining area, ensuring a balance of natural light and ventilation with east facing windows for positive energy flow.
Guest room situated in the north-west zone to ensure calm energy, with appropriate openings.
Modern bathroom ensuring privacy and positioned appropriately per Vastu guidelines, preferably not directly below the kitchen or in the north-west zone.
Study area with adequate lighting from east side windows, fostering productivity and balance.

additional_features.description: A modern swimming pool designed on the south-east corner of the plot to balance water elements as per Vastu guidelines.
landscaped garden integrated with the house for relaxation and aesthetic enhancement.
